briefTitle: OFS in Premenopausal Node+ Breast Cancer With Low Genomic Risk
officialTitle: Endocrine Therapies With Ovarian Function Suppression in Premenopausal Node+ Early Breast Cancer With Low Genomic Risk (INTERSTELLAR Trial, KBCSG-25)
conditions: Breast Cancer, Estrogen Receptor Positive Tumor, HER2-negative Breast Cancer, Premenopausal Breast Cancer, Node-positive Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ER+HER2- breast cancer
* Premenopausal and age \<=50
* T1 or T2
* N1 including micrometastasis
* Genomic Low Risk by OncoFREE test® (1-20)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Postmenopausal women
* ER-negative breast cancer
